metadata.title: CVE-2018-20460 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In radare2 prior to 3.1.2, the parseOperands function inlibr/asm/arch/arm/armass64.c allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service(application crash caused by stack-based buffer overflow) by crafting aninput file.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
